snippet: A film looks at the Native Americans of northern New Jersey and separates their real story from the myths that have defined them for generations of outsiders in the state.
abstract: Steven Oritt documentary film American Native details quest of Ramapough Lenape Nation, Native American tribe centered around Stag Hill region in New Jersey, for respect and recognition; film will be shown at Clairidge Cinema in Montclair and Warner Theater in Ridgewood in September (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: A film looks at the Native Americans of northern New Jersey and separates their real story from the myths that have defined them for generations of outsiders in the state.

headline.print_headline: Myth and Reality in the Ramapough Nation
headline.main: Documentary Explores Struggle of New Jersey’s Ramapough Tribe
